SCTX:
Begin drerel_indaren

	short done
	short nolore

	if ( done == -1 )
		return
	endif

	if ( GetJournalIndex "MV_MissingCompanion"	< 10 )
		return
	endif

	if ( GetCurrentAiPackage != 3 )
		return
	endif

	if ( OnDeath == 1 )
		AddTopic "Drerel was killed"
		Journal "MV_MissingCompanion" 70
	endif

	if ( GetJournalIndex "MV_MissingCompanion" >= 30 )
		if ( GetJournalIndex "MV_MissingCompanion" < 50 ) 
			if ( GetDistance "Falanu Indaren" <= 512 )
				Journal "MV_MissingCompanion" 50
				ForceGreeting
				set done to -1
			endif
		endif
	endif

end
